forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
